FUNC.NAME: codabarNotisEditing
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is to enable Codabar Notis formatting.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only Codabar labels with the NotisEditing formatting property set to true:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="Codabar:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="Codabarnotisediting:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only Codabar labels with the NotisEditing formatting property set to true:
The following example enables the scanner to read only Codabar labels with the NotisEditing formatting property set to true:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-Codabar" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-Codabarnotisediting" Content="true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports Codabar.
